title: Liberalism and Its Discontents with Patrick Deneen

media:group.media:title: Liberalism and Its Discontents with Patrick Deneen
media:group.media:description:
Center on Wealth & Poverty Director Christopher F. Rufo will speak with Professor Patrick Deneen about his most recent book Why Liberalism Failed, the civil unrest sweeping the nation, and the upcoming election.

Patrick J. Deneen is Professor of Political Science at the University of Notre Dame and has written four books, including The Odyssey of Political Theory, Democratic Faith, Conserving America?, and most recently, Why Liberalism Failed.
